definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad
fitting snugly/appropriate/suitable/variant of 貼|贴[tie1]/to paste/to obey

sentences.english: Explore the scope and unique custom printed invitations or contemporary wedding stationery.
sentences.chinese: 探索的範圍和獨特的現代定製印刷喜帖或結婚文具。

sentences.english: Design and illustration for wedding invitation and stationery.
sentences.chinese: 喜帖和婚禮相關紙品的插畫和設計。

sentences.english: I never received his wedding invitation so I didn't go.
sentences.chinese: 我沒收到過他的結婚喜帖，所以我沒去。

sentences.english: This is Lee Street, a unique wedding invitation street.
sentences.chinese: 這就是利東街，一條獨具特色的喜帖街。

definition: double happiness cakes, pastries offered by a man to his fiancée's family at the time of their engagement
sweet given on a happy occasion (esp. wedding)
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
wedding feast/liquor drunk at a wedding feast
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)
